original_text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans, whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices.
korean_text: 그 때 마침 두어 사람이 와서 빌라도가 어떤 갈릴리 사람들의 피를 그들의 제물에 섞은 일로 예수께 아뢰니

sentences.original_text: There were present at that season some
that told him of the Galilaeans
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그에게 갈릴리 사람들에 대해 말했다
